title: Toyota Confirms Launch Of New C-HR+ BEV In Europe While Hybrid Plans Expand In US
description:
Toyota USA has announced a new plan to sell hybrid Corollas in the US, potentially stepping on the toes of its BEV plans featuring new 2026 C-HR crossover SUV.

The post Toyota Confirms Launch Of New C-HR+ BEV In Europe While Hybrid Plans Expand In US appeared first on CleanTechnica.
